Package game

Class AttackBehaviour

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.AttackBehaviour
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Behaviour
    public class AttackBehaviour
extends java.lang.Object
implements Behaviour
    A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
    Author:
    ram

    • Constructor Detail

      • AttackBehaviour

        public AttackBehaviour​(ZombieCapability attackableTeam)
        Constructor. Sets the team (i.e. ZombieCapability) that the owner of this Behaviour is allowed to attack.
        Parameters:
        attackableTeam - Team descriptor for ZombieActors that can be attacked

    • Method Detail

      • getAction

        public Action getAction​(Actor actor,
                        GameMap map)
        Returns an AttackAction that attacks an adjacent attackable Actor. Actors are attackable if their ZombieCapability matches the "undeadness status" set
        Specified by:
        getAction in interface Behaviour
        Parameters:
        actor - the Actor acting
        map - the GameMap containing the Actor
        Returns:
        an Action that actor can perform, or null if actor can't do this.
